Package com.tyndalehouse.step.core.service

Interface TimelineService

All Known Implementing Classes:
TimelineServiceImpl
public interface TimelineService
The timeline service gives access to all the data relating to the timeline the events, the configuration, etc. The timeline data is currently loaded from a CSV file and stored in the database

  • Method Details

    • getTimelineConfiguration

      EntityDoc[] getTimelineConfiguration()
      Retrieves the whole configuration of the timeline. This defines a number of different bands, each with their hotpots. Each timeband is given a suggested scale (or time unit - decade, century, month day), etc. The hotspots also also given a unit.
      Returns:
      a list of timebands with all the required details

    • getTimelineEvents

      EntityDoc[] getTimelineEvents(org.joda.time.LocalDateTime from, org.joda.time.LocalDateTime to)
      Returns events that fall within a certain time period
      Parameters:
      from - from date
      to - to date
      Returns:
      a list of timeline events contained between the two dates

    • getEventsFromScripture

      TimelineEventsAndDate getEventsFromScripture(String reference)
      Given a reference to a passage, this looks up the relevant set of events
      Parameters:
      reference - the reference to look up
      Returns:
      a set of events and the date at which they occur

    • getTimelineEvent

      EnhancedTimelineEvent getTimelineEvent(String id, String version)
      Returns all the required information about a timeline event
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the event
      version - the version to use to lookup any associated verse numbers
      Returns:
      the timeline event with all its data

    • lookupEventsMatchingReference

      EntityDoc[] lookupEventsMatchingReference(String reference)
      Parameters:
      reference - reference of the scripture passage under consideration
      Returns:
      the list of events matching that reference
